QuestData.Title: Money Matters
QuestData.Description: I love working in the market, although there's one aspect of this job I really dislike: collecting debts.$b$bWhile most pandaren debts are simply due to laziness, there are a few unsavory characters around town who simply don't want to pay, and there's some who are just too poor.$b$bA few people here in town owe me money. Could you go talk to them, and remind them about what they owe?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Spicemaster Jin Jao's Payment, Trader Jambeezi's Payment, Innkeeper Lei Lan's Payment, and Lolo Lio's payment.
